root.name: Broken Sword II: The Smoking Mirror - Remastered
root.description: Revolution software announced that Broken Sword II will make a comeback early 2011 as Broken Sword II - The Smoking Mirror: Remastered for iOS, Mac and PC. It will be released along with a digital comic by Dave Gibbons and the game will have fully animated facial expressions, enhanced graphics and high quality musc. Other features include cross-platform saving and achievements.
